text: It shipped and arrived quickly. It was very well packaged. Everything arrived as described, and it was competitively priced. In perfect condition, looks great, and is a quality product with great fast service. This is a one-of-a-kind, awesome seller; delivery was prompt. The item was perfectly packaged. The item arrived with no issues. If you've never bought from this seller, then you should. The seller had the best price, and it was a fast and easy purchase. They have great communication.

I was looking for a NEW apple watch and this seller has a fantastic reviews which made me select him to buy the watch. The watch arrived after a little hiccup with FedEx delivery on the weekend and the seller was quickly to respond to my message regardless the weekend.
Watch condition is NEW as described, watch band never opened, so far so good. Price wise is amazing for a brand new apple 9 series.
I would recommend this seller to anyone looking to find a fantastic deals.
BEST SELLER ON EBAY ! FANTASTIC on all levels = communication, speed, shipping (1 1/2 days) , packing, description ,price  !  DO BUY HERE WITH CONFIDENCE ! GOD Bless !

When I got kit box was pretty much smashed. Seller was very quick in responding to my issue. Offered a rebate if I kept item or full refund if I wanted to return item. Decided to keep it and there was no damage to contents. Very satisfied with service provided by seller. Only took four days of back and forth emails and have already received refund. Could not be happier with outcome. Would certainly buy from this seller again.

Purchasing from the seller was an absolute dream. I placed my order in the morning and received notification in the afternoon that it had shipped and the next day receive the tracking number. The communication was phenomenal. The quality of the product was better than described and the price point was perfect. I would purchase from the seller again. ￼￼
Good price, and the package arrived undamaged, just as described. Shipping took a couple of weeks, but that’s not bad. Good seller!

Very nice medicine cabinet. Unfortunately arrived damaged and the seller  made the return quite easy providing a prepaid return label. 
Listed as open box w/o original packing,  due to its weight the packing material was not quit substantial enough to protect the corners which were damaged as a result. 
Great value and free shipping.
Recommend this seller and would not hesitate to order from them again.

Excellent purchase!  The LEGO 76923 Speed Champions Lamborghini Lambo V12 Vision GT arrived brand new and in perfect condition. The box was well protected, no dents or creases, and the set itself is exactly as described. Great value for the price, especially given how hard this model can be to find in mint condition. Fast shipping and professional packaging from vipoutlet. Highly recommend this seller and would buy from them again.
